title: [经济]iMonies v2.2 —— iConomy的延续版本！[1.4.7R1.0]
author: gaoqiao1q1q1q
txt_content:
本帖最后由 gaoqiao1q1q1q 于 2013-2-10 11:54 编辑 

今天翻插件，翻了N多页以后，功夫不负有心人啊，终于找到了接替 iConomy的插件iMonies！这什么名字都。。{:10_492:}进入正题        

    特点
浏览器翻译：简单：有没有配置所需的负载和使用！的速度：iMonies，几乎每一个命令应该是即时的。没有加载，无需等待，只是在做。连续性：需要执行多个脚本，每个命令执行的行动，只有行动。功能丰富：有超过20个命令和不断增长的，您的使用不仅限于！亮度：iMonies只需40千字节的空间，而且几乎没有任何RAM或CPU！快速更新：我们努力更新iMonies，打破它的东西，在一个小时内！原文：Simplicity: There's no configuring required; just load and use!
Speed: With iMonies, every command should be almost instant. No loading, no waiting, just doing.
Continuity: No need to execute multiple scripts, each command does that action and that action only.
Feature-packed: With over 20 commands and growing, your use is not limited!
Non-intensity: iMonies takes just 40 kilobytes of space, and barely any RAM or CPU!
Quick Updates: We strive to update iMonies within an hour of something breaking it! 它是如何工作 
浏览器翻译：iMonies让您的服务器经济的核心。它给每个用户一个平衡点，插件可以存入/提取/集平衡。iMonies是唯一的从任何其他经济插件，使用户能够获得贷款。当用户得到贷款，他们会欠那么多钱。很快就会有一个iMonies处罚从欠的钱，你可以随时禁用贷款​​。原文：iMonies gives your server an economic core. It gives every user a balance, and plugins can deposit/withdraw/set that balance. iMonies is unique from any other economy plugin by allowing users to get loans. When a user gets a loan, they'll owe that much money. iMonies will soon have a penalty from owing money, and you can always disable loans.
开发构建（devbuild) 
http://build.mciseries.com:8080/job/iMonies/? 
此处为下载地址 
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/imonies/files/6-2-2/选择对应的版本吧~{:10_496:}
